text_logic_form: Point $E$ is the orthocenter of triangle $ABC$.
The length of the line $ED$ is $6.4$ units.
Find the length of the line $BC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Point $E$ is the orthocenter of triangle $ABC$.
The length of the line $ED$ is $6.4$ units.
Find the length of the line $BC$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AD$ is $5.3$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $A$.
The line $CD$ is perpendicular to the line $BD$.
The line $BA$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AD$, $BA$, $BC$, $BD$, $CA$, $CD$ forming a triangle $ABC$ and its perpendiculars.
